name: The Visual Novel
description:
Description
On a particularly dull day, you found yourself browsing through itch.io store page, looking for a new game to play. It was then you happened to stumble upon a visual novel titled "The Visual Novel".  Out of curiosity, you decided to download it and play it in your PC. No harm to it, you thought to yourself.

Inside the game, you met with a digital character named Ali who seems to be an affable enough fellow. During that moment, your objective became clear. Get to know Ali, make some choices, and hopefully have a good time in the end.

Or you can just quit the game. No pressure.

Features:

  • Meet Ali, your 'love interest'
  • Few short minutes of content
  • Free to play experience
